metadata.description: Pathfinder Conversation Guide Questions with KA/iKA/FA/MA alignment scoring

KA.name: Kinematic Alignment
KA.description: Restores the native kinematics of the knee by replicating the patient's pre-arthritic joint anatomy

iKA.name: Inverse Kinematic Alignment
iKA.description: Modified kinematic alignment approach with selective adjustments for extreme anatomical variations

FA.name: Functional Alignment
FA.description: Balances soft tissues while maintaining functional biomechanics and natural joint line orientation

MA.name: Manual Alignment
MA.description: Traditional mechanical alignment approach targeting neutral mechanical axis and standardized component positioning
